Title: Build a new China and make a great effort to forge ahead
Notes: This poster is heavily damaged, with gaps in the man's upper arm, middle right, and in the text, lower right. The impressum (designer, date, publisher, etc.) is missing.The missing parts have been copied in from a reproduction in People's China, 1952 n. 9, p. 40, where the name of the designer is given as Sun Sun.
